contents.item: Always account for each unit of passing time
Life is a race against disappearing time
Monitor and control every passing day so as to live without regrets
To waste time is to become wasted
Be conscious about life and time in order to maximize your time effectively
Dedicate time to discovering yourself and find out the purpose of your creation
Everything in existence evolves from time
You’ve got little time on earth, make each day count
We are products of time
Getting fired from work is not a tragedy
Investing time in adding value to yourself is the best way to invest time
Losing your job gives you access to time
It’s only when you find God that you can discover your calling
The disappearing time is the race of life
Life is as a result of time evolution
Making a product is just an activity, making a profit on a product is the achievement.
Everything depends on the wealth of time
Use time to discover who you are
The way we assess time as humans determines what we become
Don’t allow your life disappear into an abstract mirage
You have to discover the essence of your creation
Time is the essence of life
Dedicate time to yourself and do things that help you grow
Always convert your time into wisdom
Invest your time adding value to others
Maximizing time is making sure that every second is accounted for
You have to discover the needs of the people you want to minister to
Be persistent and diligent in the way you spend your time daily
Your job cannot sustain you, only your calling can
You need to live a productive life
If you don’t leave your job, your job will leave you someday
Money is a product of time
Joblessness is a time for reflection
After losing you job, you have to sit, relax and discover yourself
The product of your life depends on your choices
Control yourself every passing second and make sure that no unit of time is being wasted
Employment deprives you of innovations
Convert your time into value
Don’t just bring religion to people but also change their value system
To work (at a job) is to sacrifice the life you have at the moment
Your destiny lies in your hands and can be molded with each passing day by the choices you make
Joblessness gives you control over the product of your life
Time spent effectively can be compensated
Life is made up of time
Always invest your life in your calling and purpose
Knowing what to do with time is the key to being productive
Your environment should be your time marker
You can multiply your life through work, not jobs
You must always overcome your comfort zone
There is a huge difference between work and a job
Always be the light. Do not wait for others to take responsibility
Joblessness gives you unlimited access to wealth
Life is a totality of time
Wisdom is the ability to see the invisible
Invest in yourself by discovering your gift
Don’t neglect or ignore every second that passes
It’ll never be too late to start to make use of the time you still have left
What you do with your time on a daily basis determines how far you will go in life
Life is in time; seconds, minutes and hours
You attract poverty when you lack value for time
Employment is the greatest dream killer
Living without regrets is maximizing time
Time can be used to convert anything
A life without product is a wasted life
Wasting and losing time is equivalent to wasting and losing your life
Proper and effective use of time yields good result
Production is the greatest assessment of time well spent
Joblessness does not necessarily mean idleness
Information that a book possesses is made of time
Effectiveness in life is a measure of how many products you are able to produce in life
Stop killing and wasting time. Get something done today
Time is one of the most important components of life
The goal is not to be delivered of your problem only but to be an instrument of God
Losing your job is a great blessing in disguise
The purpose of the church is to reveal to the people who God is
The best way to assess yourself is to base the assessment on the product you produce daily
Losing your job is an awesome opportunity to look inside yourself and make new discoveries
Every minute, hour and hour that passes daily should be converted into product
Purposefully spend time to better yourself
Convert everything around you into meaningful products
Devote time wisely to discover your true self
Make optimum use of every second that passes daily
Discover your calling and add value to it
You throw away the substance from which life is made of when you waste time
You need to invest your time on earth
To maximize time is to make sure that every second, minute and hour counts
To convert a day is to produce a product
Create/add value to your life on a daily basis
Employment deprives you of the purpose of existence
Wasting time is when seconds, minutes and hours are passing without being converted
